name: NIOS / Open School after 10th or 11th
description: Complete 10th or 11th–12th through National Institute of Open Schooling for flexible learning.

Study at your own pace
Appear for board exams
Pursue higher education or vocational courses

name: 11th–12th Commerce → BCom + CA/CS/CMA foundation
description: Complete 11th–12th Commerce and start CA/CS/CMA for chartered accountancy or management.

name: 11th–12th Arts → BA + civil services / teaching path

name: Polytechnic / ITI / Vocational Diploma after 10th/12th
description: Join Polytechnic or ITI for technical skills and direct job entry.

name: 12th pass → SSC CHSL / other 12th-level exams
description: After 12th, prepare for SSC CHSL and other government exams for clerical jobs.

name: 10th pass → Diploma in Engineering
description: Direct diploma in engineering after 10th for technical skills.

Complete 3-year course

name: 12th pass → BCA for IT

Learn programming and IT skills

name: 12th pass → BBA for business
description: BBA for business administration and management roles.

name: 12th Arts → BA LLB

name: 10th pass → ITI in Electrician

name: 11th–12th → NDA for defense

name: 12th pass → Nursing Diploma

description: Backstage-business course to manage singers, dancers and performers.

Learn contracts, bookings and social media promotion
Assist agencies or independent artists

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Stage Direction & Performance Design
description: Theatre-focused course on directing, blocking and visual design for stage.
educationRoute: Join 1–2 year stage direction diploma
Assist senior directors in plays and musicals
Create own small productions and showcases

name: 10th / 12th → Certificate in Kids Dance & Movement Teaching
description: Specialised training to teach creative movement to children.
educationRoute: Join 6–12 month kids dance teacher course
Learn child-safe choreography and games
Collaborate with schools and activity centres

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Sound Design for Live Performance
description: Audio course focused on mixing sound for singers, bands and dance shows.
educationRoute: Enroll in 1-year live sound / sound design diploma
Learn consoles, microphones and stage acoustics
Work on concerts, competitions and theatre shows

name: 12th pass → BPA in Theatre with Acting & Movement
description: Performing arts degree combining acting, movement and basic choreography.
educationRoute: Clear audition/entrance for BPA Theatre
Train in body movement, voice and stage presence
Choreograph small pieces for plays and showcases

name: 10th pass → ITI Mechanic (Diesel / Petrol)
description: Workshop-based trade for repairing two-wheelers and four-wheelers.
educationRoute: Join 1–2 year ITI Mechanic trade after 10th
Train in engine, brakes, electrical and diagnostics
Apprentice at authorised service centres or garages

name: 10th / 12th → ITI in Computer Hardware & Networking
description: Technical trade to assemble, repair and network computers.
educationRoute: Enroll in 1–2 year computer hardware & networking course
Learn PC assembly, OS installation and basic networking
Do on-field support with local IT vendors

name: 10th pass → Diploma in Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: Polytechnic diploma focusing on circuits, communication and devices.
educationRoute: Appear for polytechnic entrance if required
Complete 3-year diploma in ECE
Do industrial training in telecom or electronics firms
careerOptions: Further BE/BTech ECE through lateral entry

name: 10th pass → Diploma in Chemical Engineering
description: Process-industry oriented diploma for chemical plants and utilities.
educationRoute: Join 3-year chemical engineering diploma
Study process control, safety and instrumentation basics
Intern in chemical, pharma or FMCG plants

name: 10th pass → Diploma in Mining Engineering
description: Technical diploma for surface and underground mining operations.
educationRoute: Enroll in 3-year mining engineering diploma
Learn mine planning, safety and geology basics
Take training with mining companies

name: 10th pass → Diploma in Textile Technology
description: Diploma focused on yarn, fabric manufacturing and processing.
educationRoute: Join 3-year textile technology diploma
Study spinning, weaving and finishing processes
Do industrial internship in mills or garment units

name: 10th / 12th → Diploma in Agriculture & Dairy Technology
description: Applied course in crop, animal husbandry and dairy operations.
educationRoute: Enroll in 2–3 year agriculture & dairy diploma
Train at farms, co-operatives and milk plants
Learn fodder, breeding and milk processing basics

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Nursing Assistant / Patient Care
description: Paramedical course for bedside assistance and basic patient care.
educationRoute: Join 1–2 year nursing assistant / patient care diploma
Train in hospitals for vitals, hygiene and basic procedures
Work under registered nurses and doctors
careerOptions: Step towards GNM / BSc Nursing later

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Cardiac Care Technology
description: Specialised paramedical course in cardiac diagnostics and ICU support.
educationRoute: Complete 12th (science preferred)
Join 2–3 year cardiac care tech diploma
Train in ECG, echo and cath lab support

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Biomedical Equipment Technology
description: Course to maintain and calibrate hospital machines and devices.
educationRoute: Join 2–3 year biomedical equipment diploma
Learn installation, calibration and troubleshooting
Work with hospitals or medical equipment suppliers

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Aviation Ground Operations & Cabin Services
description: Skill course for airport ground staff and entry-level cabin crew.
educationRoute: Enroll in 1–2 year aviation ground operations / cabin services diploma
Train in check-in, customer service and safety
Apply to airlines and ground handling agencies

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Air Cargo & Logistics
description: Logistics diploma focused on air cargo, warehousing and documentation.
educationRoute: Join 1–2 year cargo/logistics programme
Learn airway bills, cargo safety and tracking
Train in cargo terminals or freight forwarders

name: 12th pass → B.Sc in Hotel & Hospitality Administration
description: Three-year hotel management degree covering front office, F&B and housekeeping.
educationRoute: Clear hotel management entrance (where applicable)
Complete 3-year BSc hospitality programme
Do industrial training in hotels or cruise lines

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Bakery & Confectionery
description: Hands-on culinary course for breads, cakes and desserts.
educationRoute: Join 1–2 year bakery and confectionery diploma
Train in commercial bakery and patisserie labs
Intern with hotels, bakeries or cloud kitchens

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Tour Guiding & Travel Operations
description: Tourism course for local/heritage guiding and basic travel operations.
educationRoute: Enroll in 1-year tour guiding / travel operations diploma
Learn local history, itinerary planning and group handling
Register as guide where required and work with travel firms

name: 10th / 12th → Certificate in Food Safety & Hygiene Supervision
description: Short course on food safety norms and basic QA for kitchens and factories.
educationRoute: Join 3–6 month food safety supervisor training
Learn FSSAI basics, hygiene and documentation
Work in restaurants, canteens or food units

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Supply Chain & Warehouse Operations
description: Operations‑oriented programme for warehouses, e-commerce and logistics.
educationRoute: Enroll in 1–2 year supply chain / warehouse diploma
Learn inventory, documentation and basic analytics
Intern with logistics firms, 3PLs or e-commerce centres

name: 12th pass → Diploma in Banking, Financial Services & Insurance (BFSI)
description: Skill course for front-office and back-office banking roles.
educationRoute: Join 6–12 month BFSI skills programme
Learn accounts, loans, KYC and digital banking basics
Train via internships in banks/NBFCs

name: 12th pass → Diploma in General Insurance & Claims Processing
description: Course in insurance basics, policies and claim documentation.
educationRoute: Enroll in 1-year insurance & claims diploma
Learn underwriting basics, policy terms and claim process
Intern with insurance companies or TPAs

name: 12th pass → B.Com (General) with Accounting & Business
description: Three-year general commerce degree for accounts and business roles.
educationRoute: Enroll in B.Com after 12th commerce/any stream as allowed
Study accounting, economics, law and tax basics
Do internships in firms or start-ups

name: 12th pass → BMS / BBA in Management Studies (Generic)
description: Undergraduate programme covering marketing, HR and operations.
educationRoute: Clear college/university admission/entrance
Complete 3-year BMS/BBA with internships
Build projects and networks in chosen domain
careerOptions: Path to MBA or specialised PG diplomas

name: 12th Science → B.Sc Biotechnology / Microbiology
description: Lab-based degree in biotech or microbiology for research and industry.
educationRoute: Complete 12th (PCB/PCM as required)
Join B.Sc Biotech/Microbiology
Work on lab projects and internships in pharma/food labs
careerOptions: Further M.Sc or industry R&D roles

name: 12th pass → B.Sc Nutrition & Dietetics (Standalone path)
description: Food and health focused degree for diet planning and wellness.
educationRoute: Enroll in B.Sc Nutrition & Dietetics
Study food science, clinical and sports nutrition
Intern with hospitals, gyms or wellness brands

name: 12th Science → B.Sc Forensic Science
description: Applied science degree in crime scene and lab forensics.
educationRoute: Join B.Sc Forensic Science after 12th
Study criminology, forensic biology and lab techniques
Intern with labs or investigative agencies where possible
careerOptions: Higher studies in forensics or criminology

name: 12th pass → BA English with Media & Writing Focus
description: Humanities degree emphasising communication, content and media.
educationRoute: Enroll in BA English or similar
Pick electives in journalism, creative writing or media
Build a writing portfolio through blogs or internships
careerOptions: Base for MA, teaching or media careers

name: 10th / 12th → Certificate in Cyber Security Basics
description: Entry-level course on security hygiene, networking and simple attacks.
educationRoute: Join 3–6 month cyber security foundation course
Learn networking basics, common threats and defences
Progress to advanced certifications later
careerOptions: Pathway to ethical hacking / security analyst

name: 10th / 12th → Certificate in Programming Foundations
description: Short coding course in one or two popular languages.
educationRoute: Enroll in 3–6 month programming basics course
Learn fundamentals with projects (web, scripts, apps)
Use skills to enter longer diplomas or junior roles

name: 10th / 12th → Certificate in Communication & Media Basics
description: Short course to build strong communication skills and basic media awareness.
educationRoute: Join a 3–6 month certificate in communication, journalism or media
Practice speaking, writing, presentations and simple content creation
Use skills to enter longer mass‑communication or PR programs
careerOptions: Communication roles in NGOs or small companies
Support roles in media / PR / events
Base for MA, teaching or media careers

name: 10th / 12th → Certificate in Cyber Security Basics
description: Entry-level course on security hygiene, networking and simple attacks.
educationRoute: Join 3–6 month cyber security foundation course
Learn networking basics, common threats and defences
Progress to advanced certifications later
careerOptions: Pathway to ethical hacking / security analyst

name: 10th / 12th → Certificate in Programming Foundations
description: Short coding course in one or two popular languages.
educationRoute: Enroll in 3–6 month programming basics course
Learn fundamentals with projects (web, scripts, apps)
Use skills to enter longer diplomas or junior roles

name: Diploma / Certificate in Software Development
description: Practical course in programming, algorithms and basic software engineering.
educationRoute: Join 1–3 year diploma or 6–12 month intensive coding program
Learn one backend and one frontend stack with projects
Use portfolio to enter junior developer or internship roles
careerOptions: Pathway to BCA / BSc IT / BTech lateral entry

name: Coding Bootcamp with Startup & Freelancing Focus
description: Short, career-focused program on building and selling digital products.
educationRoute: Join 3–9 month full‑stack or no‑code/low‑code bootcamp
Build 3–5 real projects for small businesses or your own ideas
Learn basics of pricing, pitching and client communication
careerOptions: Tech co‑founder in a small startup
Product builder for agencies or studios

name: Certificate in Frontend Development & UI Design
description: Course that mixes coding with visual design for websites and apps.
educationRoute: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript and a UI framework (e.g. React)
Study basic UI principles: layout, color, typography
Create 6–8 portfolio projects like landing pages and dashboards

name: Certificate in Health Tech & Data Basics
description: Intro to coding for health data, devices and simple medical apps.
educationRoute: Join 6–12 month course in health informatics or health‑tech basics
Learn spreadsheets, basic programming and simple data analysis
Do a project using health or fitness data (apps, dashboards)
careerOptions: Junior data/IT support in hospitals or labs
Pathway to BSc health informatics or related degrees

name: Certificate in EdTech Tools & Coding for Learning
description: Course on using coding to build simple learning tools and platforms.
educationRoute: Learn basics of web/app development focused on education use‑cases
Create small tools: quiz apps, practice portals, learning trackers
Intern with coaching classes or edtech startups
careerOptions: Developer for coaching centres or online courses
Pathway to roles that mix teaching and tech

name: Certificate in Game / Interactive Media Development
description: Beginner course on coding for games and interactive media.
educationRoute: Learn a game engine (Unity/Unreal) and one language
Build small games or interactive stories as projects
Participate in game jams or online challenges
careerOptions: Pathway to BSc in game design / animation

name: Certificate in Coding Instruction / Teaching Assistant
description: Train to help others learn coding in institutes or online.
educationRoute: Complete 6–12 month course in core programming concepts
Practice explaining problems and debugging for others
Start as coding lab assistant or online mentor

name: Certificate in Embedded Systems / IoT Basics
description: Hands‑on course mixing coding with electronics and hardware.
educationRoute: Learn basics of Arduino/ESP32/Raspberry Pi and sensors
Build simple IoT projects like home automation or monitoring
Use projects for polytechnic/diploma or junior technician roles
careerOptions: Pathway to diploma or degree in electronics/CS
